Constructor Detail

HalfPhoneTarget

public HalfPhoneTarget(java.lang.String name,
                       org.w3c.dom.Element maryxmlElement,
                       boolean isLeftHalf)
Create a target associated to the given segment item.

Parameters:
name - a name for the target, which may or may not coincide with the segment name.
item - the phone segment item in the Utterance structure, to be associated to this target
isLeftHalf - true if this target represents the left half of the phone, false if it represents the right half of the phone
